testsuite.name: com.emp.testcases.Alert_Policies_Test
testsuite.system-out: Step1 . clicked on Behavior Module and Selected Alert Policies Sub-Module Step2 . clicked on Add_New_Alert Button Step3 . Clicked on Rule Name Text Field and Entered Rule Name Step4 . Clicked on Location Drop-Down and Selected Any Location Step5 . Selected All_Locations option Step6 . clicked on Department Drop-Down and Selected Any Department Step7 . Selected All_Departments option Step8 . clicked on Emloyee Drop-Down and Select Any Employee Step9 . Clicked on What_trigger_The_rule Text Field Step10 . Writing Any Note (passing Data) Step11 . clicked on Whom-to-be-notified Drop-Down and Select Any option Step12 . clicked on Save_And_Launch_Button
